```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "figure/",
  message = FALSE)
```

```{r results_plot, echo = FALSE, fig.height=10}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(stringr)

results <- read_rds(here("data", "results.rds"))

results <- results %>%
  mutate(
    method = paste(type, ordering, sep = "+")
  )

results %>%
  ggplot(aes(n, n_colours, colour = method)) +
    geom_jitter(size = 1, alpha = .03, height = 0) +
    geom_abline(colour = "blue", alpha = .2, slope = 1, intercept = 0) +
    ylim(0, 30) +
    xlim(0, 30) +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
```


```{r other_results_plot}
results %>%
  group_by(n) %>%
  slice_min(n_colours) %>%
    ggplot(aes(n, n_colours, colour = method)) +
    geom_jitter(size = 1, alpha = .3, height = 0) +
    geom_abline(colour = "blue", alpha = .2, slope = 1, intercept = 0) +
    ylim(0, 30) +
    xlim(0, 30) +
    theme_minimal()
```
